label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_017
content:
## 2026-01-19 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /zone-transfers: REQUESTS 44 | p50: 610ms p95: 1485ms p99: N/A | err: 2.3% (1 errors) | success: 97.7%
- /ixfr-requests: REQUESTS 224 | p50: 610ms p95: 1485ms p99: N/A | err: 1.3% (3 errors) | success: 98.7%

- /propagation: REQUESTS 36 | p50: 73s p95: 182s p99: N/A | err: 0% | success: 100%
- /dns-queries: QPS avg: 23100 | QPS peak: 56500 | nx_domain: 2.1% | servfail: 0.06% | udp: 96.8% | tcp_fallback: 1.3%
- /dnssec: zones_signed: 74 | signing_queue_depth: 2 | signature_refreshes: 124 | ds_mismatch: 0 | bogus_validation_events: 2
- /health-checks: authoritative_reachability: 99.98% | soa_serial_mismatch: 1 | lame_delegation: 0

- /errors: format_error: 9 | refused: 24 | rate_limited: 12 | truncation_tc: 0.5%
- /capacity: zones: 640 | records: 2,269,800 | dynamic_updates/hr: 345
- /compliance: zonefile_lint_errors: 4 | dnssec_policy_violations: 0 | audit_log_gaps: 0

- bind-master-01: CPU 34% | Mem 63% | Disk 77% | Conns: 1290 | Net: 88/120 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 26% | Mem 51% | Disk 57% | Conns: 1098 | Net: 65/84 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 55% | Mem 70% | Disk 53% | Conns: N/A | Net: 110/148 Mbps | Queue depth: 5
- signer-01: CPU 40% | Mem 75% | Disk 63% | Conns: N/A | Net: 17/22 Mbps | HSM slot utilization: 64%

- pool-name: active 0 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion: 0 | max: N/A | avg_wait: 0ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 88.2% | Bandwidth: 78 Mbps | Origin requests: N/A

### Alerts
- [INFO] TSIG warning on hostname: confirmed time sync and reloaded key
- [INFO] SOA serial mismatch on hostname: resolved by rebuilding zone and reapplying
- [INFO] Rate limiting policy updated for malformed queries

### Deployments & Changes
- Migrated 16 zones; added automated SRV record validation for SIP-related services to ensure priority/weight integrity
- Updated rate limiting policy for malformed queries; format errors decreased after tuning drop thresholds

### Events
- Migrated 16 zones; added automated SRV record validation for SIP-related services to ensure priority/weight integrity
- One SOA serial mismatch flagged after manual hotfix in git; resolved by rebuilding zone and reapplying through pipeline
- Minor TSIG warning observed on one transfer; confirmed time sync and reloaded key; no recurrence
- Updated rate limiting policy for malformed queries; format errors decreased after tuning drop thresholds

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: V. Petrov. 1 pages. 6 tickets. Status: Stable; minor serial mismatch corrected and new validation checks added
